metadata.title: CVE-2017-7436 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libzypp before 20170803 it was possible to retrieve unsigned packageswithout a warning to the user which could lead to man in the middle ormalicious servers to inject malicious RPM packages into a users system.

criterions.comment: libzypp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
